'''2.93''' was an update for [[PlayStation 4 Edition]] released on August 13, 2024,<ref>https://www.reddit.com/r/UpdateCrazy/comments/1erd44v/minecraft_293_patch_notes_for_ps4_bedrock_update/</ref> which fixed bugs, alongside [[Bedrock Edition 1.21.20]]. It is accessible through the ''Editions'' button ''Minecraft for Playstation 4''.

==Fixes==
*Fixed item and block corruption when converting worlds to ''Minecraft for Playstation 4''.
